cu.cs.cpsc215.project3

Class GameState

  • java.lang.Object
    • cu.cs.cpsc215.project3.GameState
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class GameState
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Created by Ryan on 4/8/2015. Minimal class to save the data to be serialized. Keeps track of what cells are turned on and off through boolean array.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
